DataElement.preferredName: Patient Age At Blood Collection Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The age of a patient when a sample of blood is obtained.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate position, location, or state.

A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/11/18 jk added application status. 5/17/16 jk created for MCL Lung.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured, assigned or computed to describe an individual's age.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
